title: WhatsApp security advisory (AV25-559)
description: On August 29, 2025, WhatsApp published a security bulletin to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: WhatsApp for IoS  versions prior to v2.25.21.73
WhatsApp Business for IoS  versions prior to v2.25.21.78
WhatsApp for MAC  versions prior to v2.25.21.78
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
